posts.post_title: T206 Chase blue portrait PSA5 for sale
posts.post_content:
[IMG]http://www.monkberry.com/~edhans/t206chase1.jpg[/IMG]
$225.00

Website just updated. Link below. Many new cards (including lots of T206s) and lower prices. 10% off all listed prices for Net54 members. Free shipping on orders over $300.00. Insurance extra. Checks and money orders only. No electronic payments. New York residents must add sales tax. As always, "I'll take it" takes precedence over ongoing negotiations. Email correspondence strongly preferred [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url]. Thanks for looking.
